Description: Enjoy living in Howard County, home to one of our country's top school districts, when you make Howard Crossing in Ellicott City, MD your address. Our one- and two-bedroom apartments for rent have fully equipped kitchens, ceramic-tile baths, air conditioning, and a balcony or patio. Some new or renovated apartments offer eat-in kitchens, a washer and dryer, plus a separate den or office. Unparalleled amenities include a resort-style pool with fountain, playground, and clubhouse with free Wi-Fi. You'll also love living in a wooded area with rolling hills and gorgeous landscaping. * With Howard Crossing's ideal location, commuting to Washington, DC and Baltimore is convenient and easy. Simply take I-70, I-695, U.S. Route 29, or the nearby bus at Town and Country Blvd. at West Springs Drive. You'll also love being a little over three miles from Safeway! On-site parking is provided. Housing choice vouchers, as well as cats and dogs, are accepted.

Description: At Century Corporation we are proud of our outstanding customer service rating for over 40 years. Our residents have consistently given us high marks on the quality of service we provide day in and day out. Our team stands ready each and every day to make your stay a positive and pleasant experience. By choosing a Century apartment community, you get the added benefit of knowing that we value what you value: living happy. Imagine...a morning stroll through the tree-laced courtyards located in the heart of Ellicott City. Chatham Gardens Apartments has the kind of make-yourself-at-home feeling that convinces you that you would be comfortable here. Here you will find exceptionally designed apartment homes that offer spacious floor plans with extra storage features in every apartment home, and all at an affordable price. Chatham Gardens is just minutes to the Baltimore/Washington International Thurgood Marshall Airport, I-695 and I-70, shopping, dining and entertainment venues are just a short drive away.

Located within walking distance of historic Ellicott City, Maryland main street, this quaint community features a large selection of antique and specialty shops, restaurants and cafés. Built on 18 acres, the 198 apartment home community features incredible amenities, both inside and out. Burgess Mill Station is right next door to Howard County’s new Roger Carter Community Center. Description: Orchard Meadows at North Ridge Apartments is located in historic Ellicott City, MD. Ellicott City is known for its convenient location, historic downtown and outdoor recreation opportunities. The accessible location allows residents easy access to Baltimore and Washington DC from major thoroughfares such as US-Route 29, Interstate-95 and Route 100. The historic downtown Ellicott City is just a few miles from Orchard Meadows offering eateries, boutique shops and historical location that contribute to its charm. For outdoor enthusiasts Ellicott City offers three major parks within 5 miles of the community. Orchard Meadows at North Ridge offers spacious one and two bedroom apartments for rent. In addition, residents enjoy an attractive collection of community amenities to include a strength and cardio center with yoga studio, cyber caf, swimming pool with sundeck seating, and an outdoor kitchen and fire pit. As a Milestone Management Community, our residents enjoy online resident services and bill pay and 24-hour emergency maintenance service. All of which allow for a more relaxed and carefree living to those that call us home.

Description: A thriving, luxury community in beautiful Ellicott City, Kaiser Park's apartments, features two bedroom apartment homes and three bedroom townhomes. Our homes offer spacious floor plans, custom two-tone paint, and uniquely-styled GE appliances in all kitchens. Just minutes away from downtown Historical Ellicott City, you have easy access to eateries, boutique and historical locations.

Description: Alta at Regency Crest is located at 3305 Oak West Drive Ellicott City, MD and is managed by Wood Partners, a reputable property management company with verified listings on RENTCafe. Alta at Regency Crest offers 1 to 3 bedroom apartments ranging in size from 703 to 1414 sq.ft. Amenities include Air Conditioner, BBQ/Picnic Area, Business Center, Carpeting, Clubhouse and more. This rental community is pet friendly, welcoming both cats and dogs. Property is located in the 21043 ZIP code. For more details, contact our office at (855) 451-1676 or use the online contact form and we will get back to you as soon as possible.

Description: Imagine living in the Turf Valley resort community in picturesque Ellicott City, Maryland. Adjacent to a world class golf course and resort, Oakmont Village Apartments At Turf Valley offers an oasis of tranquility in a fast paced world. Across the street from the shopping and entertainment opportunities of the new Turf Valley Towne Square including a new Harris Teeter grocery store, Oakmont Village Apartments offers spacious one and two bedroom apartments with all the amenities – plus a community room with fitness and business centers, and two elevators in each building. All this in a extraordinary village setting nestled next to one of Maryland’s premier resort and golfing destinations. Meticulously designed and built with signature Keelty Homes quality, one of Maryland’s oldest and most respected home builders, serving Marylanders since 1904. Best of all, Oakmont Village Apartments at Turf Valley is your personal oasis to luxury living, just a few minutes away from the old world ambiance, shopping and award-winning fine dining of historic main street Ellicott City, a perennial selection by Money Magazine as one of the Best Places To Live in the United States.

Description: Waverly Gardens is a 62 or better community. Our apartment community offers moderate-income seniors decreased costs and healthier indoor air quality. Description: Well maintained, updated 3BR 2BA Condo with secure entry into building. Kitchen has stainless steel appliances. One assigned parking space and plenty of guest parking spaces available. This condo is conveniently located in the Columbia area (right off of Rt 108) and can walk to some shopping and restaurants. (Shipley's Grant) Easy access to Rt 100, 95 and 32. Swimming pool and playground are on the premises. Schools are close by. One small cat or dog (under 30lbs) accepted w/pet deposit of $350.00.

Description:
Charming 1830s 2 bedroom brick home located in Oella. Original heartwood floors, beautiful porch overlook, updated kitchen, across the street from the Patapsco River and state park, walking distance to restaurants and shops in old Ellicott City. Many parks and trails in neighborhood.
Small town feel but very close to Catonsville, Baltimore and Columbia. Easy access to 695, Route 29 and Interstate 70.

Description:
This 2BR house has upgraded kitchen with stacked washer dryer, gas range, gas furnace, fireplaces, and central air conditioning
About a block from the Patapsco River and the beautiful millrace trail, this stone house is less than a ¾ mile walk to the shops and restaurants on Main Street of Old Ellicott City. The Patapsco Valley State Park is to the north and south, and nearby there are hiking/running/biking trails and swimming holes, tubing and kayaking. Many important historic sites are readily accessible. Over 200 years old, this rehabbed duplex is a contributing element to the National Register Historic District of Oella. 
Although a place apart nestled in a river valley, Oella is conveniently located within 10 minutes of Interstate Routes 29 and 695. The Baltimore Inner Harbor, BWI Airport, and Columbia are within 20 minutes. Washington DC is nearby.

Description:
(703) 825-0957 - Beautiful Updated 3BR/3.5BA SFH in Ellicott City, MD ($300 OFF) - $300.00 Off 1 Month’s Rent if Moved In by October 1st!!
Beautiful Updated 3 Bedroom 3 Full and 1/2 Bathroom Single Family Home in Ellicott City, MD. Features a gorgeous hardwood foyer, spacious living room with working gas fireplace, separate dining room, and a ½ bathroom. Updated kitchen features rich hardwood flooring, granite countertops, pantry closet, and all appliances including dishwasher. Second floor has a full hall bath with marble tiled floors and 3 spacious bedrooms with walk in closets including a master bedroom with full master bath with tiled walk in shower. Fully finished basement clubroom has a separate office area, kitchenette area and fully updated bath with tiled floors and jetted soaker tub. Basement also has unfinished laundry/storage area with washer/dryer included. Neighborhood has playground, basketball courts, running trails and is convenient to great shopping and “Dorsey Run” metro station. Home has a fully fenced in backyard, attached 1 car garage, screened in deck, separate deck, and separate patio for entertaining!
Pets considered on a case by case basis with additional security deposit!
Contact JC Solorzano at (703) 825-0957 for details or to schedule an appointment or email jsolorzano@baymgmtgroup.com
You can apply for this unit or get more information at our website http://www.baymgmtgroup.com/laurel-md-rental-listings/laurel-single-family/
Good Credit Score required. Any slightly lower scores will be considered on a case by case basis.
(RLNE3444089) Other Amenities - Other- fireplace, hardwood floors, granite countertops, marble floors, basement clubroom, jetted soaker tub, community basketball courts, Garage, Yard, Patio, Deck. Appliances - Dishwasher, Washer & Dryer. Pet policies - Small Dogs Allowed, Cats Allowed, Large Dogs Allowed.

Description:
(443) 548-0191 - End of Group Home Located in River Mill Estates Community - Come and view this lovely home located in Ellicott City. Features 3 bedrooms with 2.5 bath, finished basement, fenced in yard, country style kitchen and the home is freshly painted! Close to Old Ellicott City, Route 40,29 and 70.
Call us now and set up an appointment!
*Voucher Holders are welcome to apply.
*$35 application fee per each occupant over 18 years old.
*Background and Credit Check Required
*No pets
* Will accept 2 year lease
*Initial lease term will end by May 2019
No Pets Allowed
(RLNE2561496) Other Amenities - Other- central heat, portable microwave, community playground. Appliances - Dishwasher, Air Conditioning, Refrigerator, Range, Oven, Washer & Dryer. Pet policies - No Dogs Allowed, No Cats Allowed.

Description:
---- SCHEDULE A SHOWING ONLINE AT: http://showmojo.com/lac/628528c065 ----
Incredible 5 bedroom, 3 full bath single family home in Worthington. Approximately 5000 sqft of living space over 3 finished levels. Covered front porch. Eat in kitchen with island, dbl wall oven, cooktop, stainless appliances, granite counters. Family room with vaulted ceiling, fireplace, lots of windows. Formal living and dining rooms. Bedroom and full bath on the main level. Large master bedroom suite with tray ceiling and luxury bath, 3 additional bedrooms and 1 full bath on the second level. Finished basement with rec room and lots of storage. Laundry on main level. Huge paved patio. Close to shops, restaurants, and commuter routes. No smokers. Pets considered.

Description:
Come see this spacious penthouse condominium in a community that the Baltimore Sun calls a Hidden Gem! This freshly painted 3 bed, 2 full bath condominium offers soaring vaulted ceilings, totally renovated kitchen and baths with ceramic tile floors, pergo flooring in living and dining rooms, Verizon FIOS high speed internet, and high efficiency front loader washer/dryer. Reserved parking space directly in front of the building. Enjoy your evenings on your private balcony that overlooks the lovely park-like setting of your new community. Enjoy easy access to major routes (100, 29, 95) with the many amenities of Columbia and Ellicott City at your doorstep.
Pet Friendly. Tenants responsible for electric and cable. Water paid by landlord.

Description: Large and luxurious 4 bedroom, 3 bath single family home in the coveted Turf Valley Overlook neighborhood of Ellicott City. The home feautures an open floor plan on the first level, including updated appliances, a kitchen island, and a separate sun room/breakfast nook. The sun roof opens up to the spacious, double-wide deck and fenced-in back yard with storage shed. The home also has an attached 2 car garage, and there are 3 full bathrooms in the home, including one in the master suite. The basement is finished, and this beautiful home is perfect for families seeking one of the best school districts in the county. Description:
187 units built in 1995. These spacious, beautiful garden apartment homes offer you superb design choices and spectacular amenities. From the luxury of a laundry room with a full-size washer and dryer right in your apartment, to the cost-efficiency of gas heat and cooking, you'll be thrilled with the Orchard Crossing lifestyle.
And you barely have to set foot out the door to enjoy the convenience of this Columbia location. We are an easy walk to the movies, day care, shopping, fast food and restaurants, banking, the hair salon and more! In addition, Orchard Crossing is ideally located for an easy commute to Baltimore, Washington, or Columbia, with close proximity to Routes 29, 95, 108, and 100, and Howard County Park-and-Ride lots.
This is Orchard Crossing. This is a great place to live. 24 hour on call emergency maintenance

Description: Plum Tree Apartments is in a fantastic Howard County apartment location. The floor plans are enormous! A king size bed fits easily in the master, with generous walk-in closets, an eat-in kitchen, big sliding glass doors, and a sunny balcony. Plum Tree Apartments is nestled within the renowned Centennial School District. We have a beautiful swimming pool, playground, and offer easy access to excellent shopping and dining. This community has a great family feel, with planned events and a very attentive staff taking good care of you. And we are pet friendly!

Description: Built in 2009, the property features well appointed one and two bedroom apartments in a mid rise elevator building. Each apartment has a complete kitchen with serving bar, wall to wall carpeting, and plenty of closet and storage space. Our building features include a grand lobby, lounge with warming kitchen, library, fitness center, computer room and garage parking.Located in prestigious Ellicott City, Ellicott Gardens is one of the few upscale, affordable options for moderate income renters.

Description: Tiber Hudson is a thriving community that seniors, age 62 and over, call home. Located within walking distance of Historic Ellicott City, this community offers 25 spacious studio and one bedroom apartment homes. Relax in your bright, spacious apartment home or enjoy a cup of tea in the beautifully appointed community room. At Tiber Hudson you have the best of both worlds, peace-of-mind that comes with living in a senior community combined with opportunities to participate in exciting social and recreational activities. For your convenience, we are easily accessible to bus transportation, shopping centers, restaurants, and the local senior center.
